url.helpText: Provide the full URL to access the JIRA project. e.g. https://my.project.at.my.host

email.helpText: The user should have permissions to access and read all information about your project and it configuration.

appToken.helpText: Provide the project's app token to programatically access the project information.

projectName.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch projects from server. Select from the list of projects fetched.

items.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch all issue types available. Select one or more issues to monitor from the list fetched.

newState.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch all states from server. Select from the list the state from which lead time will be calculated.

startState.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch all states from server. Select from the list the state from which cycle time will be calculated.

closeState.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch all states from server. Select from the list the state that marks the end of lead time and cycle time.
